titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia records, 1973-1982
titlestmt.subtitle: Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia records R0038
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Jimmy Luong

publicationstmt.publisher: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-04-11T14:26-0400

change.item: Converted to schema conforming EAD by dtd2schema.vh.xsl.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia records

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center.

did.abstract: This is a 16 box collection of items donated by the Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia records must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia records, R0038, Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accessioned by the Special Collections Research Center on 11/1/2011 and 4/18/2016.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: EAD markup completed by Jimmy Luong in 2018.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains items such as photographs, meeting minutes, correspondence, and newpaper articles from the Consortium for Continuing Higher Education in Northern Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arrranged in original order.
